description: Adaptive Layout definition for the EditableCallout component.
label: EditableCallout

allowWrite.description: Specifies whether the EditableCallout component is writable.
allowWrite.label: Allow Write

disabled.description: Specifies whether the EditableCallout component is disabled.
disabled.label: Disabled

open.description: Specifies whether the EditableCallout component is visible.
open.label: Open

placeholder.description: The placeholder value for the text field when no value exists.
placeholder.label: Placeholder

value.description: The value for the EditableCallout component.
value.label: Value
